lblDownloadAllTracks.description: Label for the link used to download all the audio tracks

lblDownloadAllTracksNote.message: Remember to scroll down the track list until all the tracks are loaded before to click.

msgAudioTrackFound.message: 1 audio track found. Download will start soon.
msgAudioTrackFound.description: Notification message displayed when 1 audio track is found.

msgAudioTracksFound.message: $TRACK_COUNT$ audio track(s) found. Download will start soon.
msgAudioTracksFound.description: Notification message displayed when 1 or more audio tracks are found.

msgAudioTracksNotFound.message: No audio tracks found. Check again your filters and remember to scroll down the track list until all your tracks have been loaded.
msgAudioTracksNotFound.description: Notification message displayed when no audio tracks are found.
